question: Which of the following set of polymers are used as fibre? (i) Teflon (ii) Starch (iii) Terylene (iv) Orlon
explanation: Terylene (Dacron) is a polyester used as a fibre.
Orlon (Polyacrylonitrile) is used as a synthetic wool fibre.
Teflon is a non-stick coating (plastic). Starch is a polysaccharide (food/energy storage).
